snippet: All that time devoted to policing shoes could be better spent observing passengers.
abstract: Editorial contends John Pistole, who has announced plans to retire as head of Transportation Security Administration, has left transformation of agency's approach to airline security incomplete; maintains creation of true 'risk based' approach to security screening, which would mean more unpredictable and variable measures, is necessary and difficult task that must also be sold to a skeptical public.
lead_paragraph: All that time devoted to policing shoes could be better spent observing passengers.

headline.main: A Smarter Approach to Airline Safety
headline.print_headline: A Smarter Approach to Airline Safety
